alert.note: Alert for Bee; Live Oak; San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 13 at 5:03AM CDT until May 13 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN SAN PATRICIO...EASTERN LIVE OAK AND SOUTH CENTRAL BEE COUNTIES... At 502 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Argenta, or 10 miles west of Skidmore, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Beeville, Mathis, Skidmore, Argenta, Tynan and Lakeside. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 30 and 41. US Highway 59 between mile markers 698 and 704. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
